name: TERROR (itch)
description:
Get to know this game!

You are Paul Davidson!

You Have Been Kidnapped while walking home.

you have been taken into this test rooms.

everything is a test there!

Enemies You Might Incounter Are Scary!

  Monster

Monster is a living blob who kinda looks like a character who is from fnf. i made it simular to bob by accident. who cares! inspired! so this thing's health is 15.

it can eat you up so dont go near it.

 S.C.A.R.E

Aka "Scientificly Crafted Animals Rarely Encountered"

This fella is slow and does alot than "BOB" aka monster does. its health is 25

and does alot more than eat. it can swing and hit a homerun with your head!

 LilBratt 

It is the most annoying thing in the game! [which i made annoying on purpouse]

[and no its mouth does look like a na- symble. its not. its not from germany!]

also it does 0.001 damage. how many they are = it can do alot of damage!

its health is 30 btw lol

 Lord

lord is the most op character i have ever made! plus its name is based on how strong it is! i recomend the revolver which you get in lvl 9 or a secret thing if you will.

its health is a half quarter from yours! 50% hp for that guy. and more of him will kill you quicker than the lilbratts combined!

 Blood Monster

same with those bob monsters but weaker and faster than Lord! they are a coloney of people who died in a pool of blood, came back like this! you can find them in lvl 8, 9, 10 and 15!!! sorry for spoilers! but i had to let you know!

know your allies!

 ok im sorry who invited you?

he is a person helping you? i guess? and you already know who kidnapped you on your way home.

he is everywere ever since lvl 5. which i made horribly. also he made those monsters but lord is the one unstabble. exept one who is standing still not knowing who he is.

he did not make the blood monsters!

This Game will come out in april 23 i promise!

if you want sequal, squeal in the comments- "TERROR 2"
